summary: Get the URL of an artboard
author: Alexandru Dobra-Somesan
name: Artboard Deep Link
description:
Fast obtain the exact web link (URL) of the selected artboard for you to paste it in a browser to see your project directly opening at that.
This is a great way to direct other people exactly to a particular place in your project.
The link gets automatically copyied to the clipboard of your computer.
Works with Prototype and Spec.
Careful: First be sure to save your project and share it online.
TUTORIAL: Click on the "Get support" link below.
